name: Gir's Dark Blazebyte Theme
description: Basic, dark theme for BlazeByte.org's forums. Currently only being developed for Firefox, but chrome should be added soon.
additional_info:
Beta 0.3 - 2/23/13
  *removed BBl theme in favor of a forum theme
  *removed user-defined colors (may make a return)
Beta 0.2.1 - 3/18/12
  *bugfix
Beta 0.2 - 3/18/12
  *new (toggle-able) logo
  *user-definable colors
Beta 0.1 - 2/27/12
  *Initial Release
